supervisor.experiance: 'I use a few times a month when my battery suddenly goes dead. I do not worry about it and do not have to worry about charging my powerbank when Power Powerfull is literally everywhere.'
supervisor.name: Denis

courier.experiance: 'I take it on every shift, sometimes 2-3 times. It is great that there is a tariff for couriers. Administration and collectors also use the service for work.'
courier.name: Michael

field_manager.experiance: 'The service is great at helping me work non-stop and make the most of what you have planned for the day. I do not have to waste time recharging my gadget.'
field_manager.name: Aleksandr
